DOC.brief_summary: Patients admitted for heart failure that are provided discharge medication services by a pharmacist are less likely to be readmitted within 30 days of primary admission.
DOC.brief_title: Reducing 30-day Readmissions in Patients With Heart Failure Through Pharmacist Discharge Medication Services
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of heart failure, discharged from any medical service Unwilling to participate, discharged to nursing/rehab facility, nonEnglish speaking, resident unavailable
